meanings.definition: The act of elevating or raising something.
meanings.sent1: The elevations of the blocks helped create a tall tower.
meanings.sent2: The elevations of the mountains made them challenging to climb.
meanings.sent3: The elevations of the cupcakes on the table made them look like a delicious mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The elevations of the music in the concert hall lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The elevations of the balloons in the sky added a festive touch to the party.

meanings.definition: The height above a given level, especially sea level.
meanings.sent1: The elevations of the hill provided a beautiful view of the valley below.
meanings.sent2: The elevations of the airplane allowed passengers to see the clouds from above.
meanings.sent3: The elevations of the cake layers made it a towering dessert at the party.
meanings.sent4: The elevations of the skyscrapers in the city symbolized progress and modernity.
meanings.sent5: The elevations of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: A drawing or diagram showing a side view of an object or structure.
meanings.sent1: The architect presented detailed elevations of the new building design.
meanings.sent2: The elevations in the blueprint helped visualize the final look of the house.
meanings.sent3: The elevations of the car in the sketch made it look like a futuristic vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The elevations of the bridge in the drawing highlighted its elegant design.
meanings.sent5: The elevations of the tree in the diagram showed its branching structure clearly.
